live_updates: Services in the area have been restored. Thank you for your patience.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
Our teams are looking into it. We estimate service will be restored by 10:30am. Please stay tuned for updates.
37850.summary: Some customers in the Northern area of Kenora are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
37850.title: May 30 – Kenora (North) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: Services in the area have been restored. Thank you for your patience.

Our teams are looking into it. We estimate service will be restored by 12:00pm. Please stay tuned for updates.
37861.summary: Some customers in Redcliff are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
37861.title: May 30 – Redcliff | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
